files.description: End-to-end QA runner that executes a minimal smoke test first, captures full stdout/stderr into canonical artifacts under outputs/qa/exec_logs/, detects failure signatures, performs automatic retry, and writes an environment dump (container image hash, resources, dependency versions) on retry-triggered failures.
Minimal smoke test entrypoint designed to run first and quickly validate basic runtime assumptions (Python, filesystem, Docker availability) while emitting deterministic output for log capture.

Environment introspection utility that collects container identity (image hash when available), host/container resources, OS details, and dependency versions and writes a structured dump to outputs/qa/exec_logs/ for failure triage.
Centralized catalog and matching logic for known unstable/unsupported-environment failure signatures used to trigger automatic retry and env dump behavior.
Shared subprocess execution helpers that stream and tee stdout/stderr to canonical log files with timestamps, exit codes, and per-attempt metadata.
Path canonicalization helpers that standardize output locations (including outputs/qa/exec_logs/) and ensure directory creation across local/CI/Docker runs.
Dockerfile that installs project dependencies and provides a consistent container environment for running the QA smoke test and full QA pipeline.
Container entrypoint that invokes the QA runner with sensible defaults and ensures logs and environment dumps are written under outputs/qa/exec_logs/.
Docker Compose configuration to build and run the QA pipeline in a container with mounted outputs directory for canonical artifact capture.

missionDescription: Add a minimal smoke test target that runs first, capture full stdout/stderr into canonical artifacts under `/outputs/qa/exec_logs/`, and implement an automatic retry + environment dump (container image hash, resources, dependency versions) when the failure signature is detected.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Diagnosing the recurring CodeExecutionAgent failure (‘container lost after testing 0/50 files’) removes a systemic blocker to generating reliable execution artifacts and running benchmarks/verificatio...
